description: This policy allows the IT admin to configure the Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version in the desktop. The following list shows the supported values: 0 (default) â€“ The new Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME is on by default. Allow to control Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use. 1 - The previous version of Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME is always selected.  Not allowed to control Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use. 2 - The new Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME is always selected.  Not allowed to control Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use.
name: ConfigureSimplifiedChineseIMEVersion

options.description: Allows you to configure which Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use. The new Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version is configured by default.
options.name: Allows you to configure which Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use. The new Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version is configured by default.
options.displayName: Allows you to configure which Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use. The new Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version is configured by default.

options.description: Does not allow you to configure which Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use. The previous version of Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME is always selected.
options.name: Does not allow you to configure which Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME version to use. The previous version of Microsoft Simplified Chinese IME is always selected.
